name: Big Hunting: Deer Shoot Pro
description:
Big Hunting: Deer Shoot Pro is real thrilling deer hunter games in desert ,jungle and mountain with long range advanced weapons.
Challenging best deer shooter for deer hunt at mountain and forest. Addictive animal hunting with aim to shoot for the deer hunting game.
Features

• The incredible Jurassic jungle, open to exploring!
• High-Quality graphics
• Unique hunting weapons and accessories
• Map and radar to locate and track deer’s
• High-end, immersive action packs game play!
• Easy touch and drag game play to rotate axis
